results.description: Bristol come back from 17-0 down to beat Exeter with an injury-time try at Sandy Park to go top of the Premiership.
results.shortTitle: Bears stun Exeter with second-half comeback
results.title: Premiership: Bristol Bears complete remarkable comeback against Exeter

results.description: Exeter Chiefs face Bristol Bears & London Irish take on Leicester Tigers in the Premiership & Cornish Pirates face Ampthill in the Championship - listen to local BBC radio commentary.
results.title: London Irish, Leicester Tigers, Exeter Chiefs & Bristol Bears in action - listen live

results.description: Saracens have put rugby union "in a dangerous place" after they were found to breach salary cap rules, says ex-England captain Chris Robshaw.
results.title: Saracens have 'put rugby union in a dangerous place', says ex-England captain Chris Robshaw

results.description: Exeter director of rugby Rob Baxter praises his side for showing their 'fighting spirit' to come back and beat Worcester.
results.title: Exeter Chiefs: 'Fighting spirit' hailed by boss Rob Baxter after close Worcester win

results.description: Harry Williams scores the winning try to maintain Exeter's 100% Premiership record on trips to Worcester.
results.shortTitle: Exeter snatch another win at Worcester
results.title: Premiership: Exeter Chiefs score late to snatch 24-20 win over Worcester at Sixways

results.description: Bath beat Exeter Chiefs in the Premiership to bounce straight back from their thumping season-opening loss at Bristol.
results.shortTitle: Bath beat Exeter for Hooper's first win
results.title: Premiership: Bath 13-10 Exeter Chiefs - Rhys Priestland gives Bath battling win

results.description: Stuart Hogg says Gregor Townsend should continue as Scotland boss despite failing to lead them out of the World Cup group phase.
results.title: Stuart Hogg backs Scotland boss Gregor Townsend after World Cup exit

results.description: Scotland full-back Stuart Hogg says he chose to join Exeter as he hopes it is "the perfect place to excel as a rugby player".
results.title: Stuart Hogg: Exeter Chiefs' Scotland full-back relishing Premiership chance

results.description: Exeter begin their Premiership campaign with a hard-fought win against Harlequins at Sandy Park.
results.shortTitle: Exeter edge past Quins in season opener
results.title: Premiership: Exeter Chiefs 22-19 Harlequins

thumbnail.altText: Jonny Hill scored Exeter's only try against Quins

results.description: Bath host Exeter Chiefs in the English Premiership and Jersey Reds face Doncaster Knights in the Championship - listen to BBC radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Bath v Exeter Chiefs & Jersey v Doncaster
results.title: Listen to Bath v Exeter Chiefs & Jersey Reds v Doncaster Knights latest

results.description: Despite having big names away at the World Cup, Saracens and Exeter lead the contenders as the Premiership season starts.
results.title: Premiership: Saracens & Exeter Chiefs lead contenders for 2019-20 crown

thumbnail.altText: Alex Goode with the Premiership Rugby trophy

results.description: Wales winger Alex Cuthbert could be set for a breakout season for Exeter, according to director of rugby Rob Baxter.
results.title: Alex Cuthbert: Exeter Chiefs winger could have 'best season', says Rob Baxter

results.description: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Northampton Saints as it happened, while Exeter, Saracens and Worcester all win.
results.shortTitle: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Saints
results.title: Premiership: Relive Saracens' opening-weekend loss to Saints as it happened

results.description: Stuart Hogg says it has not kicked in yet that his Scotland side were knocked out of the Rugby World Cup, but when it does it will haunt him for a long time.
results.shortTitle: Scotland exit 'will eat away at me for a long, long time' - Hogg
results.title: Stuart Hogg: Scotland defeat by Japan 'will eat away at me'

thumbnail.altText: 'It will eat away at me for a long, long time'

results.description: Full-back Stuart Hogg says Scotland's Rugby World Cup exit in Japan will "eat away" at him "for a long, long time".
results.shortTitle: 'It will eat away at me for a long time'
results.title: Scotland: Rugby World Cup exit 'will eat away' at Stuart Hogg 'for a long time'

results.description: Pool winners Sale, Harlequins and Exeter are joined by best-placed runners-up Saracens in the Premiership Cup semi-finals.
results.shortTitle: Sale, Quins, Exeter & Sarries reach semis
results.title: Premiership Rugby Cup: Sale, Harlequins, Exeter & Saracens reach semi-finals

results.description: Exeter back-row Sam Simmonds is hoping to break back into Eddie Jones' England squad after the World Cup.

results.title: Sam Simmonds: Exeter back-row aims for England recall

results.description: Exeter boss Rob Baxter challenges his group of young scrum-halves to step up and take over from outgoing Nic White.
results.shortTitle: Young Exeter nines challenged to impress
results.title: Stuart Townsend & Jack Maunder: Exeter scrum-halves challenged to take over from Nic White

results.description: Exeter scrum-half Nic White will re-join the Brumbies Super Rugby franchise when he leaves the club in 2020.
results.title: Nic White: Exeter scrum-half to join Brumbies in summer of 2020
